answerText: crystalline solid[10] This crystal arrangement produces a 68% packing efficiency, greater than that of a simple cubic arrangement but less than that of hexagonal closest packing. Its coordination number is 8.

subject: Science
question: Question: A substance ordered in this way consists of a regular pattern called a lattice.  [10] Name this type of solid whose constituent particles are arranged orderly throughout three dimensions.
